titleStmt.title: A pindarick poem consecrated to the memory of his much honoured friend, William Fox Esquire. Who died of the fatal small pox April 12, 1680. In the 19th year of his age. Dedicated to his most afflicted parents the right honourable Sir Stephen Fox knight, one of the lords commissioners of the treasury, clerk of the green cloath, &c. and his most vertuous lady.
titleStmt.author: Maidwell, Lewis, 1650-1715.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: L. Maidwell [i.e. Lewis Maidwell].
Reproduction of the original in the Christ Church Library, Oxford.
